summary: Herman has a weakness for strip clubs. Donny has a thing for condiments and Tiffany is a newly celibate martial artist. These are Andy's new friends after he unsuspectingly follows his dream girl into a sexual addiction recovery group.

Ellingson|Samira Jowkar|Gabriel Mann|Tyffanee Smith|Dian Van Patten
title: Group Sex
